item.title: Spring Schedule
item.description: New Members Sessions: Thursday May 31st 6:30-9:00 New Members Open House Saturday June 2nd 9:00am-12:00noon Tuesday June 5th 6:30-9:00 NPMK Performances Memorial Day Parade - Monday

item.title: Welcome
item.description: The 2007 North Penn Marching Knights are happy that you have joined their podcasting comunity. Check here ofter for information about the Marching Knights show, schedule, scores and other information
item.itunes:author: Bryan Clayton
